title: FSX - IRIS Global Express XRS: Carenado Tweak
description:
This is the IRIS Global Express XRS, originally released in 2013 as a freeware easter egg. The external model has great textures for a freemium/freeware aircraft, and they probably were going to make it payware but just dropped the project.

That's where I come in. It originally used the default FSX CRJ700 VC, which lets face it, sucks. I did quite a bit of tweaking and inserted the virtual cockpit from the Carenado Hawker 850XP that was recently released. This includes the full VC, Navigraph, and all the functionalities associated with it. I also included some of the better repaints I found across the web while working on this project. 

Additionally I did quite a bit of editing on the Flight Model so it flies much more realistically. 

I realize this might not be for everyone, but for those craving another bizjet for fsx, this should give you a short time fix until the new Phemon 300 comes out.


Thanks and enjoy!
